           MOVE SQLCODE                      TO SC-DB2-SQLCODE
           IF  NOT SC-DB2-SQLCODE-OK
               MOVE SQLCODE                  TO DB2-ABEND-SQLCODE
               MOVE "CLOSE"                  TO DB2-ABEND-FUNCTION
               MOVE "MEXW008_CSR"            TO DB2-ABEND-TABLE
               MOVE DB2-ABEND-MSG            TO ABEND-MSG
               MOVE "8507P"                  TO ABEND-PARAGRAPH
               PERFORM 9999I-ABEND
           END-IF
           .
      /*****************************************************************
      * WRITE ABEND MESSAGES TO AUDIT FILE, ROLLBACK TO PREVIOUS       *
      * CHECKPOINT, CALL COREDUMP.                                     *
       9999I-ABEND.
           IF ABEND-PROGRAM                   = SPACES
               MOVE PL-PGM-NAME              TO ABEND-PROGRAM
           END-IF
           MOVE SPACES                       TO AUDIT-RECORD
           WRITE AUDIT-RECORD
           MOVE ABEND-MSG                    TO AUDIT-RECORD
           WRITE AUDIT-RECORD
           MOVE ABEND-MSG-2                  TO AUDIT-RECORD
           WRITE AUDIT-RECORD
           MOVE SPACES                       TO AUDIT-RECORD
           WRITE AUDIT-RECORD
           CALL "COREDUMP"
           .

identification_division.syntax:
IDENTIFICATION DIVISION.
PROGRAM-ID.    EXWWB909.
DATE-WRITTEN.  APRIL 2017.
DATE-COMPILED.
* PROGRAM DESCRIPTION
* EXWWB909 IS A BATCH PROGRAM THAT IS DESIGNED TO EXTRACT VEHICLE
* DATA, CUSTOMER DATA AND DEALER DATA FROM VARIOUS DB2 TABLES
* WHICH ARE OWNED AND MAINTAINED BY GEVIS AND TO CREATE AN
* OUTBOUND BRIDGE FILE WHICH WILL BE USED BY VINCENT (NORTH
* AMERICAN INCENTIVE CLAIMING SYSTEM) TO RE-REVIEW ALL VRULES
* PROGRAMS AND COMPARE TO ALL VIN RECORDS.  VINCENT WILL REVIEW
* CHARGEBACK (AUTOMATIC POST CLAIM VALIDATION) ) AND AUTO CLAIM
* GENERATION WHEN THE BUSINESS REQUESTS A "FULL PASS" IN VRULES.
* PROGRAM PROCESSSING:
* THE PROGRAM WILL READ IN AN INPUT SYSPARM FILE WHICH WILL
* CONTAIN A LIST OF PRODUCERS TO BE PROCESSED.  IT WILL PROCESS
* ONE PRODUCER AT A TIME.  WHEN A PRODUCER IS FIRST READ IN, A
* DB2 CURSOR WILL BE OPENED WHICH DRIVES OFF OF TABLE MEXW001_
* VEH_ORDER AND SELECTS ROWS WHERE THE MODEL YEARS ARE 1 YEAR
* BACK AND 2 YEARS FORWARD.  ONLY ROWS THAT ARE ASSOCIATED WITH
* A CURRENT WDMO DEALER WILL BE FURTHER  PROCESSED AND OUTPUT
* TO THE OUTBOUND BRIDGE FILE.  THE BRIDGE FILE WILL CONTAIN
* STANDARD E & G HEADERS/TRAILERS ALONG WITH VINCENT HEADERS/
* TRAILERS.
* NOTE:  THERE MAY BE INSTANCES WHERE SOME FIELDS EXTRACTED
* FROM THE GEVIS DB2 TABLES, MAY NOT BE POPULATED WITH DATA.
* IN THAT CASE, IF THE FIELD IS ALPHANUMERIC, SPACES WILL BE
* CONTAINED WITHIN THE CORRESPONDING OUTPUT FIELD AND IF THE
* FIELD IS NUMERIC, ZEROS WILL BE CONTAINED WITHIN THE COR-
* CORRESPONDING OUTPUT FIELD.
* THIS IS BASED ON LAST RUN TIMESTAMP OF THE PROGRAM.  THIS IS
* A CLONE OF EXWWB910 AND EXWWGEVP, IF THIS PROGRAM CHANGES THEN
* THE OTHER TWO SHOULD BE LOOKED AT FOR CHANGES.
*                       REVISION LOG
* DATE     PROGRAMMER REVISION
* -------- ---------- -------------------------------------------
* 04/21/17 C COOK     ETRACKER# 14835713 - PROGRAM CREATION
* DATE    : 02/08/2018  PROGRAMMER: DAWN MAHN                    *
* ETRACKER: 15334234                                             *
* REASON  : CHANGE THE MODEL YEAR CRITERIA IN THE CURSORS        *
*           FROM -1 TO -4.                                       *
*           CURSORS CHANGED: MEXW001_CSR, MEXW003_CSR,           *
*                            MEXW008_CSR AND SALE_CHK_CSR        *

*  THIS CURSOR WILL BE USED TO READ THE MEXW001 AND THE MEXW003  *
*  TABLES WHERE THE MODEL YEAR IS BETWEEN -4 & +2 OF THE CURRENT *
*  MODEL YEAR AND THE  TIMESTAMP IS BETWEEN THE CURRENT TIMESTAMP*
*  AND THE LAST RUN TIMESTAMP.                                   *
EXEC SQL
DECLARE MEXW001_CSR CURSOR WITH HOLD FOR
SELECT VEH_VIN_FULL_C
,   VEH_ORD_ID_C
,   DTA_DATA_SRC_C
,   BDT_MDL_YR_Y
,   DLR_DLR_C
,   WMI_WMI_C
,   VEH_LCL_PLT_C
,   VEH_LCL_BDYTYP_C
,   VEH_GBL_ORD_DLR_C
,   VEH_GBL_SHIP_TO_C
,   VEH_ORD_RCPT_Y
,   VEH_WDMO_FLEET_C
,   VEH_WDMO_ORD_TYP
,   VEH_CATALOG_C
,   VEH_GBL_CATALOG_C
,   VEH_PO_Y
,   VEH_GEVIS_VL_C
,   COUNTRY_ISO3_C
FROM MEXW001_VEH_ORDER
WHERE DTA_DATA_SRC_C      = :VEH-DTA-DATA-SRC-C
AND BDT_MDL_YR_Y  BETWEEN :WS-CURR-MODEL-YY -4
AND :WS-CURR-MODEL-YY +2
AND VEH_ACTIVE_F        = "Y"
AND VEH_VIN_FULL_C      > " "
AND VEH_UPDT_S  BETWEEN   :WS-PREV-RUN-TIMESTAMP
AND   :WS-CURR-DRBN-TIMESTAMP
FOR READ ONLY
END-EXEC.
*  THIS CURSOR WILL BE USED TO READ THE MEXW001 AND THE MEXW003  *
*  TABLES WHERE THE MODEL YEAR IS BETWEEN -4 & +2 OF THE CURRENT *
*  MODEL YEAR AND THE MEXW003_VEH_STATUS TIMESTAMP IS BETWEEN THE*
*  CURRENT TIMESTAMP AND THE LAST RUN TIMESTAMP.  THIS CURSOR    *
*  WILL ALWAYS CHECK FOR THESE STATUSES:  00B, 30T, 40V, 80J,    *
*  80V, 90U AND 90V.                                             *
EXEC SQL
DECLARE MEXW003_CSR CURSOR WITH HOLD FOR
SELECT A.VEH_VIN_FULL_C
,   A.VEH_ORD_ID_C
,   A.DTA_DATA_SRC_C
,   A.BDT_MDL_YR_Y
,   A.DLR_DLR_C
,   A.WMI_WMI_C
,   A.VEH_LCL_PLT_C
,   A.VEH_LCL_BDYTYP_C
,   A.VEH_GBL_ORD_DLR_C
,   A.VEH_GBL_SHIP_TO_C
,   A.VEH_ORD_RCPT_Y
,   A.VEH_WDMO_FLEET_C
,   A.VEH_WDMO_ORD_TYP
,   A.VEH_CATALOG_C
,   A.VEH_GBL_CATALOG_C
,   A.VEH_PO_Y
,   A.VEH_GEVIS_VL_C
,   A.COUNTRY_ISO3_C
FROM MEXW001_VEH_ORDER  A
,   MEXW003_VEH_STATUS B
WHERE A.DTA_DATA_SRC_C      = :VEH-DTA-DATA-SRC-C
AND A.DTA_DATA_SRC_C      = B.DTA_DATA_SRC_C
AND A.VEH_ORD_ID_C        = B.VEH_ORD_ID_C
AND A.BDT_MDL_YR_Y  BETWEEN :WS-CURR-MODEL-YY -4
AND :WS-CURR-MODEL-YY +2
AND A.VEH_ACTIVE_F        = "Y"
AND A.VEH_VIN_FULL_C      > " "
AND B.VST_UPDT_S   BETWEEN  :WS-PREV-RUN-TIMESTAMP
AND  :WS-CURR-DRBN-TIMESTAMP
AND B.STA_STATUS_C      IN ("00B","30T", "40V","80J",
"80V","90U", "90V")
AND B.VST_CUR_STAT_F      = "Y"
AND B.VST_ACTIVE_F        = "Y"
FOR READ ONLY
END-EXEC.
*  THIS CURSOR WILL BE USED TO READ THE MEXW001 AND THE MEXW008  *
*  TABLES WHERE THE MODEL YEAR IS BETWEEN -4 & +2 OF THE CURRENT *
*  MODEL YEAR AND THE MEXW008_VEH_RTL TIMESTAMP IS BETWEEN THE   *
*  CURRENT TIMESTAMP AND THE LAST RUN TIMESTAMP.                 *
EXEC SQL
DECLARE MEXW008_CSR CURSOR WITH HOLD FOR
SELECT A.VEH_VIN_FULL_C
,   A.VEH_ORD_ID_C
,   A.DTA_DATA_SRC_C
,   A.BDT_MDL_YR_Y
,   A.DLR_DLR_C
,   A.WMI_WMI_C
,   A.VEH_LCL_PLT_C
,   A.VEH_LCL_BDYTYP_C
,   A.VEH_GBL_ORD_DLR_C
,   A.VEH_GBL_SHIP_TO_C
,   A.VEH_ORD_RCPT_Y
,   A.VEH_WDMO_FLEET_C
,   A.VEH_WDMO_ORD_TYP
,   A.VEH_CATALOG_C
,   A.VEH_GBL_CATALOG_C
,   A.VEH_PO_Y
,   A.VEH_GEVIS_VL_C
,   A.COUNTRY_ISO3_C
FROM MEXW001_VEH_ORDER  A
,   MEXW008_VEH_RTL    B
WHERE A.DTA_DATA_SRC_C      = :VEH-DTA-DATA-SRC-C
AND A.DTA_DATA_SRC_C      = B.DTA_DATA_SRC_C
AND A.VEH_ORD_ID_C        = B.VEH_ORD_ID_C
AND A.BDT_MDL_YR_Y  BETWEEN :WS-CURR-MODEL-YY -4
AND :WS-CURR-MODEL-YY +2
AND A.VEH_ACTIVE_F        = "Y"
AND A.VEH_VIN_FULL_C      > " "
AND B.VRS_UPDT_S   BETWEEN  :WS-PREV-RUN-TIMESTAMP
AND  :WS-CURR-DRBN-TIMESTAMP
AND B.VRS_ACTIVE_F        = "Y"
FOR READ ONLY
END-EXEC.
* THIS CURSOR WILL BE USED TO JOIN THE MEXW001 AND MEXW008 TABLES
* WHERE THE VEHICLE WAS SOLD WITHIN THE PAST 12 MONTHS AND THE
* MODEL YEAR IS OLDER THAN 4 YEARS.
EXEC SQL
DECLARE  SALE_CHK_CSR CURSOR WITH HOLD FOR
SELECT  A.VEH_VIN_FULL_C
,A.VEH_ORD_ID_C
,A.DTA_DATA_SRC_C
,A.BDT_MDL_YR_Y
,A.WMI_WMI_C
,A.VEH_LCL_PLT_C
,A.VEH_LCL_BDYTYP_C
,A.VEH_GBL_ORD_DLR_C
,A.VEH_GBL_SHIP_TO_C
,A.VEH_ORD_RCPT_Y
,A.VEH_WDMO_FLEET_C
,A.VEH_WDMO_ORD_TYP
,A.VEH_CATALOG_C
,A.VEH_GBL_CATALOG_C
,A.VEH_PO_Y
,A.VEH_GEVIS_VL_C
,A.COUNTRY_ISO3_C
FROM  MEXW001_VEH_ORDER A
,MEXW008_VEH_RTL   B
WHERE  B.DTA_DATA_SRC_C =   :VRS-DTA-DATA-SRC-C
AND  B.VRS_UPDT_S BETWEEN :WS-PREV-RUN-TIMESTAMP
AND :WS-CURR-DRBN-TIMESTAMP
AND  B.VRS_ACTIVE_F   = "Y"
AND  A.BDT_MDL_YR_Y   <   :WS-CURR-MODEL-YY -4
AND  A.VEH_VIN_FULL_C > " "
AND  A.VEH_ORD_ID_C   = B.VEH_ORD_ID_C
AND  A.DTA_DATA_SRC_C = B.DTA_DATA_SRC_C
FOR READ ONLY
END-EXEC
* THIS CURSOR WILL BE USED TO SELECT ONE ROW FROM TABLE MEXW031
* FOR NON 'NA' AND NON 'EA' DATA SOURCES.  THE RETRIEVED VALUES
* WILL BE USED IN PLACE OF THE LOCAL BODY STYLE CODE THAT WAS
* OBTAINED FROM TABLE MEXW001.
EXEC SQL
DECLARE  MEXW031_CSR CURSOR WITH HOLD FOR
SELECT  OPT_OPTION_C
,VPT_PROD_TYP_C
FROM  MEXW031_CATMAP
WHERE  DTA_DATA_SRC_C    = :CTM-DTA-DATA-SRC-C
AND  CTM_LCL_CATALOG_C = :CTM-LCL-CATALOG-C
AND  OFM_OPTION_FAM_C IN ("BS", "CA")
OPTIMIZE FOR 1 ROW
FOR READ ONLY
END-EXEC
* THIS CURSOR IS BEING USED IN ORDER TO RETRIEVE THE MOST RECENT
* WHOLESALE GLOBAL DEALER FROM TABLE MEXW003 USING A "40V" STATUS
* CODE AND THE FTC QAD CURRENT DATA SOURCE (WD).
EXEC SQL
DECLARE  MEXW003_40V_CSR CURSOR WITH HOLD FOR
SELECT  VST_GBL_LOC_C
FROM  MEXW003_VEH_STATUS
WHERE  VEH_ORD_ID_C       = :VST-VEH-ORD-ID-C
AND  DTA_DATA_SRC_C     = :VST-DTA-DATA-SRC-C
AND  STA_STATUS_C       = :VST-STA-STATUS-C
AND  VST_ACTIVE_F       = :VST-ACTIVE-F
AND  VST_STAT_TYP_C     = :VST-STAT-TYP-C
AND  VST_CUR_DATA_SRC_C = :VST-CUR-DATA-SRC-C
ORDER BY  VST_STAT_Y  DESC
,VST_STATIC_ISRT_REC_S  DESC
FOR READ ONLY
END-EXEC
*            LINKAGE SECTION

linkage_section.syntax:
LINKAGE SECTION.
*              P R O C E D U R E   D I V I S I O N               *

procedure_division.syntax:
*                        M A I N L I N E
* ADDED STATEMENT TO MOVE 3 TO RETURN-CODE WHICH IS THE RESULT
* OF AN ORDER-ID AND PRODUCTION SOURCE GETTING A NOT FOUND COND-
* ITION WHEN EXWWSSTK SUBROUTINE WAS BEING CALLED. THE RETURN-
* CODE WILL BE CHECKED IN THE JCL AND IF IT'S 3, THEN AN EMAIL
* WILL BE SENT TO THE HELPDESK

0000P-MAINLINE.
PERFORM 0300P-OPEN-FILES
PERFORM 0400P-INITIALIZE-OTHER
PERFORM 0700P-GET-SYSPARM-RECORD
UNTIL END-OF-SYSPARM-FILE
PERFORM 6000P-CONCLUSION
IF SEND-EMAIL
MOVE 3 TO RETURN-CODE
END-IF
GOBACK
.
* PROGRAM SPECIFIC INITIALIZATION

0300P-OPEN-FILES.
OPEN EXTEND AUDIT-FILE
VINCENT-OUT
OPEN INPUT  INPUT-PARM
.
* PROGRAM SPECIFIC INITIALIZATION

0400P-INITIALIZE-OTHER.
INITIALIZE  WS-VINCENT-DETAIL-RECORD
WS-SWITCHES
WS-VARIABLES
WS-COUNTERS
PERFORM 0500P-GET-TIMESTMP
PERFORM 0600P-GET-PROGAM-PARMS
PERFORM 0750P-WRITE-AUDIT-HEADER
PERFORM 0800P-POPULATE-VINCENT-HEADER
.
* GET CURRENT TIME STAMP

0500P-GET-TIMESTMP.
PERFORM 0550P-GET-CURRENT-DATE-TIME
PERFORM 7000P-OBTAIN-DRBN-TIMESTAMP
MOVE WS-CURR-DRBN-TIMESTAMP       TO WS-HOLD-CURR-TIMESTAMP
MOVE WS-DRBN-YEAR                 TO WS-CURR-MODEL-YY
MOVE WS-CURR-MODEL-YY             TO WS-HOLD-MDL-YR-Y
.
* GET CURRENT TIME STAMP

0550P-GET-CURRENT-DATE-TIME.
ACCEPT SV-CURRENT-DATE            FROM DATE
ACCEPT SV-CURRENT-TIME            FROM TIME
MOVE SV-CURRENT-DATE-YY           TO SV-FORMAT-DATE-YY
MOVE SV-CURRENT-DATE-MM           TO SV-FORMAT-DATE-MM
MOVE SV-CURRENT-DATE-DD           TO SV-FORMAT-DATE-DD
MOVE SV-CURRENT-TIME-HH           TO SV-FORMAT-TIME-HH
MOVE SV-CURRENT-TIME-MM           TO SV-FORMAT-TIME-MM
MOVE SV-CURRENT-TIME-SS           TO SV-FORMAT-TIME-SS
.
* RETRIEVE BATCH NUMBER AND LAST RUN TIMESTAMPS

0600P-GET-PROGAM-PARMS.
MOVE LIT-SYSTEM-ID                TO GNT-SYSTEM-CD
MOVE LIT-TABLE-ID                 TO GNT-TABLE-ID
MOVE LIT-KEY-DATA-BATCHCTL        TO GNT-KEY-DATA
PERFORM 7010P-SELECT-MEXS016
MOVE GNT-ATTRIBUTE-DATA (1:5)     TO WS-PREV-BATCH-NBR
IF WS-PREV-BATCH-NBR               = 99999
MOVE 0                         TO WS-PREV-BATCH-NBR
END-IF
COMPUTE WS-CURRENT-BATCH-NBR       = WS-PREV-BATCH-NBR + 1
MOVE LIT-KEY-DATA-TIMESTAMP       TO GNT-KEY-DATA
PERFORM 7010P-SELECT-MEXS016
MOVE GNT-ATTRIBUTE-DATA           TO WS-PREV-RUN-TIMESTAMP
.
* PROCESS DATA SOURCE SYSPARMS = MAIN DRIVER OF THE PROGRAM
* RETRIEVES THE DATASOURCE FROM THE PARM AND MOVES IT TO THE DATA
* SOURCES FOR THE CURSORS.

0700P-GET-SYSPARM-RECORD.
SET NOT-END-OF-SYSPARM-FILE       TO TRUE
READ INPUT-PARM
INTO PARM-DETAIL
AT END
SET END-OF-SYSPARM-FILE      TO TRUE
END-READ
EVALUATE TRUE
WHEN END-OF-SYSPARM-FILE
AND WS-NBR-SYSPARM-RECS-READ  <= ZERO
MOVE "MISSING SYSPARM RECORDS"
TO ABEND-MSG
MOVE "PARAGRAPH 0700P"    TO ABEND-MSG-2
PERFORM 9999I-ABEND
WHEN END-OF-SYSPARM-FILE
CONTINUE
WHEN OTHER
ADD +1                    TO WS-NBR-SYSPARM-RECS-READ
MOVE INPUT-SOURCE         TO VEH-DTA-DATA-SRC-C
VST-DTA-DATA-SRC-C
VRS-DTA-DATA-SRC-C
SET MEXW001-CSR-NOT-FOUND TO TRUE
SET MEXW003-CSR-NOT-FOUND TO TRUE
SET MEXW008-CSR-NOT-FOUND TO TRUE
SET SALE-CHK-NOT-FOUND    TO TRUE
SET MEXW003-NOT-FOUND     TO TRUE
PERFORM 1000P-PROCESS-CURSORS
END-EVALUATE
.
/*****************************************************************
* WRITE AUDIT CHECKPOINT LINES                                   *

0750P-WRITE-AUDIT-HEADER.
MOVE PL-PGM-NAME                  TO AUDIT-RECORD
MOVE "AUDIT REPORT"               TO AUDIT-RECORD (10:)
WRITE AUDIT-RECORD
MOVE "PROGRAM VERSION            :"
TO AUDIT-LABEL
MOVE PAN-VALET                    TO AUDIT-DATA
WRITE AUDIT-RECORD
MOVE WHEN-COMPILED                TO SV-COMPILE-DATE-TIME
MOVE "PROGRAM COMPILE DATE/TIME  :"
TO AUDIT-LABEL
MOVE SV-COMPILE-DATE              TO AUDIT-DATA
MOVE SV-COMPILE-TIME              TO AUDIT-DATA (10:)
WRITE AUDIT-RECORD
MOVE "PROGRAM START   DATE/TIME  :"
TO AUDIT-LABEL
MOVE SV-FORMAT-DATE               TO AUDIT-DATA
MOVE SV-FORMAT-TIME               TO AUDIT-DATA (10:)
WRITE AUDIT-RECORD
.
* POPULATE THE VINCENT HEADER RECORD

0800P-POPULATE-VINCENT-HEADER.
MOVE 1                           TO WS-COUNT-LINE-NBR
STRING WS-DRBN-YEAR
WS-DRBN-MONTH
WS-DRBN-DAY
DELIMITED BY SIZE INTO
VNT-HDR-CURR-DATE
END-STRING
STRING WS-DRBN-HOUR
WS-DRBN-MINUTE
WS-DRBN-SECOND
DELIMITED BY SIZE INTO
VNT-HDR-CURR-TIME
END-STRING
MOVE LIT-WDMHAEXT                TO VNT-HDR-REC-TYPE
MOVE WS-CURRENT-BATCH-NBR        TO VNT-HDR-CURR-BATCH-NBR
MOVE WS-PREV-BATCH-NBR           TO VNT-HDR-PREV-BATCH-NBR
MOVE LOW-VALUES                  TO VNT-HDR-LOW-VALUES
MOVE VINCENT-HEADER(38:)          TO VINCENT-RECORD
WRITE VINCENT-RECORD
.
* START OF THE PROCESSING OF THE MAIN CURSORS

1000P-PROCESS-CURSORS.
PERFORM 1100P-PROCESS-MEXW001-CSR
PERFORM 1200P-PROCESS-MEXW003-CSR
PERFORM 1300P-PROCESS-MEXW008-CSR
PERFORM 1400P-PROCESS-SALE-CHK-CSR
.
* PROCESSING OF THE MEXW001_CSR

1100P-PROCESS-MEXW001-CSR.
PERFORM 8000P-OPEN-MEXW001-CSR
PERFORM 8005P-FETCH-MEXW001-CSR
PERFORM 2000P-PROCESS-GEVIS-VEHICLE
UNTIL MEXW001-CSR-NOT-FOUND
PERFORM 8007P-CLOSE-MEXW001-CSR
.
* PROCESSING OF THE MEXW003_CSR

1200P-PROCESS-MEXW003-CSR.
PERFORM 8400P-OPEN-MEXW003-CSR
PERFORM 8405P-FETCH-MEXW003-CSR
PERFORM 2000P-PROCESS-GEVIS-VEHICLE
UNTIL MEXW003-CSR-NOT-FOUND
PERFORM 8407P-CLOSE-MEXW003-CSR
.
* PROCESSING OF THE MEXW008_CSR

1300P-PROCESS-MEXW008-CSR.
PERFORM 8500P-OPEN-MEXW008-CSR
PERFORM 8505P-FETCH-MEXW008-CSR
PERFORM 2000P-PROCESS-GEVIS-VEHICLE
UNTIL MEXW008-CSR-NOT-FOUND
PERFORM 8507P-CLOSE-MEXW008-CSR
.
* PROCESSING OF THE SALE_CHK_CSR

1400P-PROCESS-SALE-CHK-CSR.
PERFORM 8100P-OPEN-SALE-CHK-CSR
PERFORM 8105P-FETCH-SALE-CHK-CSR
PERFORM 2000P-PROCESS-GEVIS-VEHICLE
UNTIL SALE-CHK-NOT-FOUND
PERFORM 8107P-CLOSE-SALE-CHK-CSR
.
* THE FIRST STEP WILL BE TO DETERMINE WHETHER OR NOT THE
* VEHICLE'S CURRENT STOCKING DEALER IS WDMO BASED. IF IT IS,
* THEN FURTHER PROCESSING WILL CONTINUE.  IF IT IS NOT, THEN THE
* VEHICLE WILL BE SKIPPED AND THEN NEXT ONE WILL BE SELECTED.
* THIS PARAGRAPH WILL BE PERFORMED UNTIL THERE ARE NO MORE VEH-
* ICLES FOR A PRODCUTION SOURCE.
* A CHECK FOR SSTK-SUCCESSFUL HAS BEEN
* ADDED BECAUSE IT IS POSSIBLE THAT WHEN CALLING SSTK, WE COULD
* GET A +100 FOR THE STOCKING DEALER.  IF THAT'S THE CASE, WE
* NEED TO SKIP THE PROCESSING AND FETCH THE NEXT RECORD.

2000P-PROCESS-GEVIS-VEHICLE.
PERFORM 2105P-VERIFY-WDMO-DEALER
IF  WDMO-DEALER
AND SSTK-SUCCESSFUL
PERFORM 2120P-PROCESS-GEVIS-DETAIL-REC
END-IF
EVALUATE TRUE
WHEN MEXW001-CSR-FOUND
PERFORM 8005P-FETCH-MEXW001-CSR
WHEN MEXW003-CSR-FOUND
PERFORM 8405P-FETCH-MEXW003-CSR
WHEN MEXW008-CSR-FOUND
PERFORM 8505P-FETCH-MEXW008-CSR
WHEN SALE-CHK-FOUND
PERFORM 8105P-FETCH-SALE-CHK-CSR
END-EVALUATE
.
* A CALL IS PLACED TO SUBROUTINE EXWWSSTK IN ORDER TO OBTAIN THE
* CURRENT STOCKING DEALER FOR A VEHICLE.  AFTERWARDS, USING THE
* CURRENT STOCKING DEALER (IF ONE WAS FOUND), A CALL WILL BE
* PLACED TO TABLE MEXW035 TO DETERMINE WHETHER OR NOT THE STOCK-
* ING DEALER IS WDMO BASED.

2105P-VERIFY-WDMO-DEALER.
PERFORM 2110P-CALL-EXWWSSTK
IF SSTK-SUCCESSFUL
MOVE SSTK-GBL-STK-DLR-C        TO
WS-VST-GBL-LOC-C-REFORMAT
MOVE WS-VST-GBL-LOC-C-REFORMAT TO DLR-DLR-DLR-C
PERFORM 7020P-GET-MEXW035-DATA
IF MEXW035-FOUND
IF DLR-SUB-SUBLVL1-C         = LIT-WDM
SET WDMO-DEALER          TO TRUE
ELSE
SET NOT-WDMO-DEALER      TO TRUE
END-IF
ELSE
SET NOT-WDMO-DEALER         TO TRUE
PERFORM 2117P-MISSING-MEXW035-ROW
END-IF
END-IF
.
* USING PRODUCTION SOURCE AND ORDER-ID, A CALL WILL NOW BE PLACED
* TO SUBROUTINE EXWWSSTK TO OBTAIN THE CURRENT STOCKING DEALER,
* CURRENT STOCKING DEALER STATUS CODE AND CURRENT STOCKING
* DEALER STATUS DATE.

2110P-CALL-EXWWSSTK.
INITIALIZE SSTK-I-O-DATA
SET SSTK-INQUIRY-MODE             TO TRUE
MOVE VEH-ORD-ID-C                 TO SSTK-VEH-ORD-ID-C
MOVE VEH-DTA-DATA-SRC-C           TO SSTK-DTA-DATA-SRC-C
CALL  "EXWWSSTK"               USING SSTK-I-O-DATA
EVALUATE TRUE
WHEN SSTK-SUCCESSFUL
ADD 1                     TO WS-NBR-EXWWSSTK-CALLS
WHEN SSTK-DB2-ERROR
PERFORM 2115P-SSTK-FATAL-ERROR
END-EVALUATE
.
* THIS PARAGRAPH HANDLES THE FATAL ERROR TOMBSTONE FORMATTING OF
* THE CALL THAT WAS PLACED TO SUBROUTINE EXWWSSTK.

2115P-SSTK-FATAL-ERROR.
MOVE SPACES                       TO AUDIT-RECORD
WRITE AUDIT-RECORD
MOVE "PGM NAME: "                 TO AUDIT-LABEL-MSG
MOVE SSTK-PGM-ID                  TO AUDIT-DATA-MSG
WRITE AUDIT-RECORD              FROM AUDIT-RECORD-MSG
MOVE "RET CODE: "                 TO AUDIT-LABEL-MSG
MOVE SSTK-RETURN-CD               TO AUDIT-DATA-MSG
WRITE AUDIT-RECORD              FROM AUDIT-RECORD-MSG
MOVE "PARAGRAPH: "                TO AUDIT-LABEL-MSG
MOVE SSTK-PARAGRAPH               TO AUDIT-DATA-MSG
WRITE AUDIT-RECORD              FROM AUDIT-RECORD-MSG
MOVE SPACES                       TO AUDIT-RECORD
WRITE AUDIT-RECORD
MOVE "TBL NAME1: "                TO AUDIT-LABEL-MSG
MOVE SSTK-DB2-TABLE1              TO AUDIT-DATA-MSG
WRITE AUDIT-RECORD              FROM AUDIT-RECORD-MSG
IF SSTK-DB2-TABLE2                 > SPACES
MOVE "TBL NAME2: "             TO AUDIT-LABEL-MSG
MOVE SSTK-DB2-TABLE2           TO AUDIT-DATA-MSG
WRITE AUDIT-RECORD           FROM AUDIT-RECORD-MSG
END-IF
IF SSTK-DB2-TABLE3                 > SPACES
MOVE "TBL NAME3: "             TO AUDIT-LABEL-MSG
MOVE SSTK-DB2-TABLE3           TO AUDIT-DATA-MSG
WRITE AUDIT-RECORD           FROM AUDIT-RECORD-MSG
END-IF
IF SSTK-DB2-TABLE4                 > SPACES
MOVE "TBL NAME4: "             TO AUDIT-LABEL-MSG
MOVE SSTK-DB2-TABLE4           TO AUDIT-DATA-MSG
WRITE AUDIT-RECORD           FROM AUDIT-RECORD-MSG
END-IF
IF SSTK-DB2-TABLE5                 > SPACES
MOVE "TBL NAME5: "             TO AUDIT-LABEL-MSG
MOVE SSTK-DB2-TABLE5           TO AUDIT-DATA-MSG
WRITE AUDIT-RECORD           FROM AUDIT-RECORD-MSG
END-IF
MOVE SPACES                       TO AUDIT-RECORD
WRITE AUDIT-RECORD
MOVE "HOST VAR1: "                TO AUDIT-LABEL-MSG
MOVE SSTK-HOST-VAR1               TO AUDIT-DATA-MSG
WRITE AUDIT-RECORD              FROM AUDIT-RECORD-MSG
IF SSTK-HOST-VAR2                  > SPACES
MOVE "HOST VAR2: "             TO AUDIT-LABEL-MSG
MOVE SSTK-HOST-VAR2            TO AUDIT-DATA-MSG
WRITE AUDIT-RECORD           FROM AUDIT-RECORD-MSG
END-IF
IF SSTK-HOST-VAR3                  > SPACES
MOVE "HOST VAR3: "             TO AUDIT-LABEL-MSG
MOVE SSTK-HOST-VAR3            TO AUDIT-DATA-MSG
WRITE AUDIT-RECORD           FROM AUDIT-RECORD-MSG
END-IF
IF SSTK-HOST-VAR4                  > SPACES
MOVE "HOST VAR4: "             TO AUDIT-LABEL-MSG
MOVE SSTK-HOST-VAR4            TO AUDIT-DATA-MSG
WRITE AUDIT-RECORD           FROM AUDIT-RECORD-MSG
END-IF
IF SSTK-HOST-VAR5                  > SPACES
MOVE "HOST VAR5: "             TO AUDIT-LABEL-MSG
MOVE SSTK-HOST-VAR5            TO AUDIT-DATA-MSG
WRITE AUDIT-RECORD           FROM AUDIT-RECORD-MSG
END-IF
IF SSTK-HOST-VAR6                  > SPACES
MOVE "HOST VAR6: "             TO AUDIT-LABEL-MSG
MOVE SSTK-HOST-VAR6            TO AUDIT-DATA-MSG
WRITE AUDIT-RECORD           FROM AUDIT-RECORD-MSG
END-IF
IF SSTK-HOST-VAR7                  > SPACES
MOVE "HOST VAR7: "             TO AUDIT-LABEL-MSG
MOVE SSTK-HOST-VAR7            TO AUDIT-DATA-MSG
WRITE AUDIT-RECORD           FROM AUDIT-RECORD-MSG
END-IF
IF SSTK-HOST-VAR8                  > SPACES
MOVE "HOST VAR8: "             TO AUDIT-LABEL-MSG
MOVE SSTK-HOST-VAR8            TO AUDIT-DATA-MSG
WRITE AUDIT-RECORD           FROM AUDIT-RECORD-MSG
END-IF
MOVE SPACES                       TO AUDIT-RECORD
WRITE AUDIT-RECORD
MOVE "SQL CODE: "                 TO AUDIT-LABEL-MSG
MOVE SSTK-SQL-RETURN-CODE         TO WS-PROCESS-SQLCODE-EDIT
MOVE WS-PROCESS-SQLCODE-EDIT      TO AUDIT-DATA-MSG
WRITE AUDIT-RECORD              FROM AUDIT-RECORD-MSG
IF SSTK-SQL-WARNING                > SPACES
MOVE "SQL-WARN: "              TO AUDIT-LABEL-MSG
MOVE  SSTK-SQL-WARNING         TO AUDIT-DATA-MSG
WRITE AUDIT-RECORD           FROM AUDIT-RECORD-MSG
END-IF
MOVE "SQL-FUNC: "                 TO AUDIT-LABEL-MSG
MOVE SSTK-SQL-FUNCTION            TO AUDIT-DATA-MSG
WRITE AUDIT-RECORD              FROM AUDIT-RECORD-MSG
MOVE "SQL-MSG1: "                 TO AUDIT-LABEL-MSG
MOVE  SSTK-SQL-MSG1               TO AUDIT-DATA-MSG
WRITE AUDIT-RECORD              FROM AUDIT-RECORD-MSG
MOVE "SQL-MSG2: "                 TO AUDIT-LABEL-MSG
MOVE SSTK-SQL-MSG2                TO AUDIT-DATA-MSG
WRITE AUDIT-RECORD              FROM AUDIT-RECORD-MSG
MOVE "SQL-MSG3: "                 TO AUDIT-LABEL-MSG
MOVE SSTK-SQL-MSG3                TO AUDIT-DATA-MSG
WRITE AUDIT-RECORD              FROM AUDIT-RECORD-MSG
MOVE "SQL-MSG4: "                 TO AUDIT-LABEL-MSG
MOVE SSTK-SQL-MSG4                TO AUDIT-DATA-MSG
WRITE AUDIT-RECORD              FROM AUDIT-RECORD-MSG
MOVE SPACES                       TO AUDIT-RECORD
WRITE AUDIT-RECORD
IF SSTK-SQL-RETURN-CODE            = 100
SET SEND-EMAIL                 TO TRUE
ADD 1                          TO
WS-NBR-EXWWSSTK-NOTFOUND-CALLS
ELSE
CALL "COREDUMP"
END-IF
.
* IF A CALL TO TABLE MEXW035 RESULTED IN A SQL +100 (NOT FOUND)
* CONDITION, THE INFORMATION WILL BE WRITTEN OUT TO THE AUDIT
* REPORT AND RETURN-CODE WILL BE SET TO 3, SO THAT AN EMAIL
* MESSAGE WILL BE SENT TO THE GEVIS HELPDESK TO INFORM THEM TO
* LOOK AT THE AUDIT REPORT.

2117P-MISSING-MEXW035-ROW.
MOVE SPACES                       TO AUDIT-RECORD
WRITE AUDIT-RECORD
MOVE "MISSING DEALER ON MEXW035:  "
TO AUDIT-LABEL
WRITE AUDIT-RECORD
MOVE "DEALER CODE:         "      TO AUDIT-LABEL
MOVE DLR-DLR-DLR-C                TO AUDIT-DATA
WRITE AUDIT-RECORD
MOVE "ASSOCIATED VIN:      "      TO AUDIT-LABEL
MOVE VEH-VIN-FULL-C               TO AUDIT-DATA
WRITE AUDIT-RECORD
ADD 1                             TO
WS-NBR-MEXW035-NOTFOUND-CALLS
.
* AT THIS POINT, THE VEHICLE HAS BEEN IDENTIFED AS HAVING A
* CURRENT STOCKING DEALER THAT IS CLASSIFIED AS WDMO.  NOW, OTHER
* DATA WILL BE GATHERED FOR THE VEHICLE AND THEN MOVED AND
* WRITTEN TO THE OUTPUT FILE.

2120P-PROCESS-GEVIS-DETAIL-REC.
MOVE LIT-E                        TO WS-DTL-VEH-DIVISION-C
PERFORM 2125P-PROCESS-WERS-STRING
PERFORM 2130P-MOVE-MEXW001-TO-DTL
PERFORM 2135P-OBTAIN-RETAIL-DATA
PERFORM 2142P-MOVE-SSTK-CURRENT-TO-DTL
PERFORM 2150P-OBTAIN-WHOLESALE-DATA
PERFORM 2160P-OBTAIN-WERS-DATA
MOVE LIT-20T                      TO WS-VST-STA-STATUS-C
PERFORM 2198P-GET-MEXW003-STATUSES
IF MEXW003-FOUND
STRING VST-STAT-Y(1:4)
VST-STAT-Y(6:2)
VST-STAT-Y(9:2)
DELIMITED BY SIZE INTO
WS-DTL-VEH-SCHD-VST-TARGET-Y
END-STRING
END-IF
MOVE LIT-30R                      TO WS-VST-STA-STATUS-C
PERFORM 2198P-GET-MEXW003-STATUSES
IF MEXW003-FOUND
STRING VST-STAT-Y(1:4)
VST-STAT-Y(6:2)
VST-STAT-Y(9:2)
DELIMITED BY SIZE INTO
WS-DTL-VEH-PRODUCE-VST-STAT-Y
END-STRING
ELSE
MOVE LIT-30P                   TO WS-VST-STA-STATUS-C
PERFORM 2198P-GET-MEXW003-STATUSES
IF MEXW003-FOUND
STRING VST-STAT-Y(1:4)
VST-STAT-Y(6:2)
VST-STAT-Y(9:2)
DELIMITED BY SIZE INTO
WS-DTL-VEH-PRODUCE-VST-STAT-Y
END-STRING
END-IF
END-IF
MOVE LIT-30T                      TO WS-VST-STA-STATUS-C
PERFORM 2198P-GET-MEXW003-STATUSES
IF MEXW003-FOUND
STRING VST-STAT-Y(1:4)
VST-STAT-Y(6:2)
VST-STAT-Y(9:2)
DELIMITED BY SIZE INTO
WS-DTL-VEH-RELEASE-VST-STAT-Y
END-STRING
END-IF
MOVE LIT-80F                      TO WS-VST-STA-STATUS-C
PERFORM 2198P-GET-MEXW003-STATUSES
IF MEXW003-FOUND
STRING VST-STAT-Y(1:4)
VST-STAT-Y(6:2)
VST-STAT-Y(9:2)
DELIMITED BY SIZE INTO
WS-DTL-VEH-ARRIVAL-VST-STAT-Y
END-STRING
END-IF
PERFORM 3010P-PROCESS-WHOLESALE
IF WS-COUNT-DTL-NBR                = 999999
MOVE ZERO                      TO WS-COUNT-DTL-NBR
END-IF
IF WS-COUNT-LINE-NBR               = 999999
MOVE ZERO                      TO WS-COUNT-LINE-NBR
END-IF
IF MEXW027-FOUND
ADD  +1                       TO WS-COUNT-DTL-NBR
WS-COUNT-LINE-NBR
WS-NBR-OUTPUT-RECS-WRITTEN
WRITE VINCENT-RECORD        FROM WS-VINCENT-DETAIL-RECORD
END-IF
INITIALIZE  WS-VINCENT-DETAIL-RECORD
.
* EXTRACT THE WERS STRING IF ONE EXISTS

2125P-PROCESS-WERS-STRING.
SET WERS-STRING-NOT-FOUND-SW      TO TRUE
INITIALIZE                           MEXW004-VEH-WERS-STRING
VWR-WERS-STRING-X-TEXT
MOVE VEH-DTA-DATA-SRC-C           TO VWR-DTA-DATA-SRC-C
MOVE VEH-ORD-ID-C                 TO VWR-VEH-ORD-ID-C
PERFORM 7030P-SELECT-WERS-DATA-W004
.
* MOVE SOME OF THE DATABASE FIELDS TO OUTPUT RECORD.  IF A WERS
* STRING WAS NOT FOUND, CHECK TO SEE IF THE ORDER HAS A CATALOG
* CODE.

2130P-MOVE-MEXW001-TO-DTL.
MOVE VEH-VIN-FULL-C               TO WS-DTL-VIN-FULL-C
MOVE VEH-DTA-DATA-SRC-C           TO WS-DTL-DTA-DATA-SRC-C
MOVE VEH-BDT-MDL-YR-Y             TO WS-VEH-BDT-MDL-YR-Y
MOVE WS-VEH-BDT-MDL-YR-YY         TO WS-DTL-BDT-MDL-YR-Y
MOVE VEH-WMI-WMI-C                TO WS-DTL-WMI-WMI-C
MOVE VEH-LCL-PLT-C                TO WS-DTL-LCL-PLT-C
IF WERS-STRING-FOUND-SW
MOVE VWR-WERS-STRING-X-TEXT(10:2)
TO WS-DTL-LCL-BDYTYP-C
ELSE
PERFORM 2132P-GET-CATALOG-DATA
END-IF
MOVE VEH-GBL-ORD-DLR-C            TO DLR-DLR-DLR-C
PERFORM 7020P-GET-MEXW035-DATA
IF MEXW035-FOUND
IF DLR-SUPER-DLR-C              = ZEROS
MOVE SPACES                 TO WS-DTL-VEH-GBL-DLR-C
ELSE
MOVE DLR-SUPER-DLR-C        TO
WS-DTL-VEH-GBL-DLR-C-REFORMAT
MOVE WS-DTL-VEH-GBL-DLR-C-REFORMAT
TO WS-DTL-VEH-GBL-DLR-C
END-IF
ELSE
MOVE SPACES                    TO WS-DTL-VEH-GBL-DLR-C
END-IF
IF   VEH-GBL-SHIP-TO-C             > SPACES
MOVE VEH-GBL-SHIP-TO-C       TO WS-DTL-SHIP-TO-DLR-C
ELSE
MOVE WS-DTL-VEH-GBL-DLR-C    TO WS-DTL-SHIP-TO-DLR-C
END-IF
STRING VEH-ORD-RCPT-Y (1:4)
VEH-ORD-RCPT-Y (6:2)
VEH-ORD-RCPT-Y (9:2)
DELIMITED BY SIZE INTO
WS-DTL-VEH-ORD-RCPT-Y
END-STRING
MOVE VEH-WDMO-FLEET-C             TO WS-DTL-WDMO-FLEET-C
MOVE VEH-WDMO-ORD-TYP             TO WS-DTL-VEH-WDMO-ORD-TYP
MOVE VEH-GBL-CATALOG-C            TO WS-DTL-VEH-CATALOG-C
IF VEH-PO-Y                        > "0001-01-01"
STRING VEH-PO-Y (1:4)
VEH-PO-Y (6:2)
VEH-PO-Y (9:2)
DELIMITED BY SIZE INTO
WS-DTL-VEH-PO-Y
END-STRING
END-IF
MOVE VEH-GEVIS-VL-C               TO WS-DTL-GEVIS-VEH-LINE-C
.
* GET CATALOG INFORMATION

2132P-GET-CATALOG-DATA.
MOVE VEH-DTA-DATA-SRC-C           TO CTM-DTA-DATA-SRC-C
MOVE VEH-CATALOG-C                TO CTM-LCL-CATALOG-C
PERFORM 8200P-OPEN-MEXW031-CSR
PERFORM 8205P-FETCH-MEXW031-CSR
PERFORM 8207P-CLOSE-MEXW031-CSR
IF MEXW031-FOUND
MOVE CTM-OPT-OPTION-C          TO WS-DTL-LCL-BDYTYP-C
ELSE
MOVE VEH-LCL-BDYTYP-C          TO WS-DTL-LCL-BDYTYP-C
END-IF
.
* A JOIN WILL BE DONE ON TABLES MEXW003 & MEXW008 TO OBTAIN
* VARIOUS RETAIL DATA (IF THE VEHICLE IS IN RETAIL STATUS).
* NOTE: THE RETAILED STATUS DATE WILL BE USED TO POPULATE THE
* DELIVERY DATE WHICH IS THE SAME.

2135P-OBTAIN-RETAIL-DATA.
MOVE VEH-ORD-ID-C                 TO VST-VEH-ORD-ID-C
MOVE VEH-DTA-DATA-SRC-C           TO VST-DTA-DATA-SRC-C
MOVE LIT-90V                      TO VST-STA-STATUS-C
MOVE LIT-Y                        TO VST-LAST-OCCUR-F
VST-ACTIVE-F
PERFORM 7040P-SELECT-MEXW008-90V-DATA
IF MEXW008-FOUND-90V
STRING VST-STAT-Y(1:4)
VST-STAT-Y(6:2)
VST-STAT-Y(9:2)
DELIMITED BY SIZE INTO
WS-DTL-VEH-RETAIL-VST-STAT-Y
END-STRING
MOVE WS-DTL-VEH-RETAIL-VST-STAT-Y TO
WS-DTL-VEH-DELIVER-VST-STAT-Y
PERFORM 2137P-POPULATE-RETAIL-OUTPUT
END-IF
.
* IF A 90V STATUS WAS FOUND FOR THE VEHICLE, THEN VARIOUS RETAIL
* SALES DATA WILL BE MOVED TO CORRESPONDING OUTPUT FIELDS.  IF
* THE 90V STATUS WAS NOT FOUND FOR THE VEHICLE, THEN SPACES WILL
* BE MOVED TO THOSE OUTPUT FIELDS.
* PER CUSTOMER, IF CUSTOMER FIRST NAME & LAST NAME IS BLANK, THEN
* THE BUSINESS NAME WILL BE MOVED TO THE FIRST NAME FIELD

2137P-POPULATE-RETAIL-OUTPUT.
MOVE VRS-LCL-FLEET-C              TO WS-DTL-VRS-LCL-FLEET-C
IF  VRS-CST-FIRST-N                = SPACES
AND VRS-CST-LAST-N                 = SPACES
MOVE VRS-CST-BUS-1-N (1:30)   TO WS-DTL-VRS-CST-FIRST-N
MOVE VRS-CST-BUS-2-N (1:30)   TO WS-DTL-VRS-CST-LAST-N
ELSE
MOVE VRS-CST-FIRST-N          TO WS-DTL-VRS-CST-FIRST-N
MOVE VRS-CST-MID-INIT-X       TO
WS-DTL-VRS-CST-MID-INIT-X
MOVE VRS-CST-LAST-N           TO WS-DTL-VRS-CST-LAST-N
END-IF
MOVE VRS-CST-ADDR-1-X             TO WS-DTL-VRS-CST-ADDR-1-X
MOVE VRS-CST-ADD-DIV2-N           TO
WS-DTL-VRS-CST-ADD-DIV2-N
MOVE VRS-CST-ADD-DIV1-C           TO
WS-DTL-VRS-CST-ADD-DIV1-C
MOVE VRS-CST-POSTAL-C             TO WS-DTL-VRS-CST-POSTAL-C
MOVE VRS-SALESPERSON-C            TO WS-DTL-VRS-SALESPERSON-C
PERFORM 2139P-POPULATE-CONCEPS-SLSTYP
IF VRS-RPT-SALE-Y                  > "0001-01-01"
STRING VRS-RPT-SALE-Y(1:4)
VRS-RPT-SALE-Y(6:2)
VRS-RPT-SALE-Y(9:2)
DELIMITED BY SIZE INTO
WS-DTL-VEH-SLSRCPT-VST-STAT-Y
END-STRING
END-IF
IF VRS-WARR-STRT-Y                 > "0001-01-01"
STRING VRS-WARR-STRT-Y(1:4)
VRS-WARR-STRT-Y(6:2)
VRS-WARR-STRT-Y(9:2)
DELIMITED BY SIZE INTO
WS-DTL-VEH-WARRANT-VST-STAT-Y
END-STRING
ELSE
IF VRS-RPT-SALE-Y               > "0001-01-01"
MOVE WS-DTL-VEH-SLSRCPT-VST-STAT-Y TO
WS-DTL-VEH-WARRANT-VST-STAT-Y
END-IF
END-IF
.
* THE GEVIS CUSTOMER TYPE CODE WILL BE CONVERTED TO A CONCEPS
* SALES TYPE CODE.

2139P-POPULATE-CONCEPS-SLSTYP.
EVALUATE VRS-TYP-LCL-CUST-C
WHEN "A1"
WHEN "0 "
MOVE "0"                  TO WS-DTL-VRS-TYP-LCL-CUST-C
WHEN "A2"
WHEN "R "
MOVE "R"                  TO WS-DTL-VRS-TYP-LCL-CUST-C
WHEN "A3"
WHEN "L "
MOVE "L"                  TO WS-DTL-VRS-TYP-LCL-CUST-C
WHEN "A4"
MOVE " "                  TO WS-DTL-VRS-TYP-LCL-CUST-C
WHEN "A5"
WHEN "E "
MOVE "E"                  TO WS-DTL-VRS-TYP-LCL-CUST-C
WHEN "F1"
WHEN "7 "
MOVE "7"                  TO WS-DTL-VRS-TYP-LCL-CUST-C
WHEN "F2"
WHEN "3 "
MOVE "3"                  TO WS-DTL-VRS-TYP-LCL-CUST-C
WHEN "F3"
WHEN "T "
MOVE "T"                  TO WS-DTL-VRS-TYP-LCL-CUST-C
WHEN "F4"
WHEN "4 "
MOVE "4"                  TO WS-DTL-VRS-TYP-LCL-CUST-C
WHEN "L2"
WHEN "L4"
WHEN "D "
MOVE "D"                  TO WS-DTL-VRS-TYP-LCL-CUST-C
WHEN "L1"
WHEN "L3"
WHEN "6 "
MOVE "6"                  TO WS-DTL-VRS-TYP-LCL-CUST-C
END-EVALUATE
.
* THE CURRENT DEALER/STOCKING DEALER, CURRENT STATUS CODE AND
* CURRENT STATUS CODE DATE WERE RETRIEVED EARLIER.  NOW THE CUR-
* RENT VEHICLE'S STATUS CODE WILL BE USED TO OBTAIN THE VINCENT
* EQUIVALENT FROM TABLE MEXW027 USING "VI" AS THE PRODUCTION
* SOURCE.
* NOTE: DURING DEVELOPMENT OF THIS PROGRAM, IT WAS DECIDED TO
* INSERT GLOBAL/LOCAL CODES ON THE MEXW027 CONVERSION TABLE,
* WITH THE VALUES THAT VINCENT USES FOR THEIR VRULES PROCESSING.
* RATHER THAN HARD CODING THE VALUES IN THIS PROGRAM AND THE
* STORED PROCEDURE (EXWWGEVP), IT IS BETTER TO MAKE A DIRECT CALL
* TO THE TABLE WHERE THE CODES CAN BE MORE EASILY CHANGED, SHOULD
* A CHANGE ARISE IN THE FUTURE.
* A CHECK HAS BEEN ADDED TO SEND VINCENT A STATUS CODE OF 600
* INSTEAD OF 800 WHEN THERE ARE NO SALES TYPE OR SALES DATE
* AVAILABLE.

2142P-MOVE-SSTK-CURRENT-TO-DTL.
INITIALIZE WS-MEXW027-SW
MOVE SSTK-GBL-STK-DLR-C           TO
WS-VST-GBL-LOC-C-REFORMAT
MOVE WS-VST-GBL-LOC-C-REFORMAT    TO DLR-DLR-DLR-C
PERFORM 7020P-GET-MEXW035-DATA
IF MEXW035-FOUND
IF DLR-SUPER-DLR-C              = ZEROS
MOVE SPACES                 TO
WS-DTL-CURR-STOCKING-DLR-C
WS-DTL-CURR-DLR-C
ELSE
MOVE DLR-SUPER-DLR-C        TO
WS-DLR-SUPER-DLR-C-REFORMAT
MOVE WS-DLR-SUPER-DLR-C-REFORMAT
TO
WS-DTL-CURR-STOCKING-DLR-C
WS-DTL-CURR-DLR-C
END-IF
ELSE
MOVE SPACES                    TO
WS-DTL-CURR-STOCKING-DLR-C
WS-DTL-CURR-DLR-C
END-IF
IF WS-DTL-CURR-STOCKING-DLR-C      > SPACES
STRING SSTK-CUR-STAT-Y(1:4)
SSTK-CUR-STAT-Y(6:2)
SSTK-CUR-STAT-Y(9:2)
DELIMITED BY SIZE INTO
WS-DTL-VEH-STOCK-VST-STAT-Y
END-STRING
END-IF
PERFORM 2145P-GET-MEXW027-INFO
IF WS-DTL-CUR-STA-STATUS-C         = LIT-800
IF VRS-TYP-LCL-CUST-C           = "A4"
MOVE LIT-801                TO WS-DTL-CUR-STA-STATUS-C
ELSE
IF WS-DTL-VRS-TYP-LCL-CUST-C = SPACES
OR WS-DTL-VEH-SLSRCPT-VST-STAT-Y
= SPACES
MOVE LIT-600             TO WS-DTL-CUR-STA-STATUS-C
END-IF
END-IF
END-IF
.
* EXTRACTS THE CONVERSION INFORMATION TO GET THE LOCAL STATUS
* CODE.

2145P-GET-MEXW027-INFO.
IF SSTK-CUR-STAT-C                 > SPACES
MOVE SSTK-CUR-STAT-C           TO CNT-GBL-DATA-X
MOVE LIT-STATUS                TO CNT-CND-CNV-TYP-C
MOVE LIT-VI                    TO CNT-DTA-DATA-SRC-C
PERFORM 7045P-SELECT-MEXW027
IF MEXW027-NOT-FOUND
MOVE SPACES                 TO AUDIT-RECORD
WRITE AUDIT-RECORD
MOVE "MISSING STATUS ON MEXW027:  "
TO AUDIT-LABEL
MOVE LIT-SPACE              TO AUDIT-DATA
WRITE AUDIT-RECORD
MOVE "STATUS CODE:         "
TO AUDIT-LABEL
MOVE CNT-GBL-DATA-X         TO AUDIT-DATA
WRITE AUDIT-RECORD
MOVE "ASSOCIATED VIN:      "
TO AUDIT-LABEL
MOVE VEH-VIN-FULL-C         TO AUDIT-DATA
WRITE AUDIT-RECORD
ADD 1                       TO
WS-NBR-MEXW027-NOTFOUND-CALLS
END-IF
IF MEXW027-FOUND
MOVE CNT-LCL-DATA-X (1:3)   TO WS-DTL-CUR-STA-STATUS-C
END-IF
END-IF
.
* TABLES MEXW003 & MEXW007 WILL BE JOINED IN ORDER TO OBTAIN
* VARIOUS WHOLESALE INFORMATION, IF THE VEHICLE HAS REACHED THAT
* STAGE.
* NOTE: THE VEHICLE TOTAL AMOUNT MUST BE IN UNITED STATES DOLLAR
* CURRENCY (USD).  IF IT IS NOT, THEN ZERO WILL BE MOVED TO THE
* FIELD.

2150P-OBTAIN-WHOLESALE-DATA.
MOVE VEH-ORD-ID-C                 TO VST-VEH-ORD-ID-C
MOVE VEH-DTA-DATA-SRC-C           TO VST-DTA-DATA-SRC-C
MOVE LIT-40V                      TO VST-STA-STATUS-C
MOVE LIT-Y                        TO VST-LAST-OCCUR-F
VST-ACTIVE-F
PERFORM 7050P-SELECT-WHOLESALE
IF MEXW003-FOUND-40V
MOVE VST-GBL-LOC-C             TO
WS-DTL-CURR-VST-GBL-LOC-C
STRING VST-STAT-Y (1:4)
VST-STAT-Y (6:2)
VST-STAT-Y (9:2)
DELIMITED BY SIZE INTO
WS-DTL-VEH-INVOICE-VST-STAT-Y
END-STRING
IF VWS-CUR-CURRENCY-C          = LIT-USD
MOVE VWS-TOT-LCL-A         TO WS-DTL-VWS-TOT-US-A
ELSE
MOVE ZERO                  TO WS-DTL-VWS-TOT-US-A
END-IF
END-IF
.
* THE WERS VEHICLE LINE CODE WILL BE OBTAINED FROM TABLE MEXW034
* OR FROM TABLE MEXW004_WERS_VL_STRING.
* IF 'EA' OR 'NA' SOURCED, THE WERS VEHICLE LINE IS OBTAINED FROM
* MEXW034 DB2 TABLE USING THE PROD SOURCE AND GEVIS VEHICLE LINE,
* WHICH WAS OBTAINED FROM MEXW001 DB2 TABLE.
* FOR ALL OTHER SOURCES, IF THE ORDER IS FOUND ON MEXW004 DB2
* TABLE, USE THE WERS VEHICLE LINE FROM MEXW004 DB2 TABLE AND
* GEVIS VEHICLE LINE FROM MEXW034 DB2 TABLE WERS PRODUCT TYPE CODE
* AND WERS BODY USE TO MAKE UP THE WERS BODY STYLE.
* IF NOT FOUND ON MEXW004 DB2 TABLE, USE WERS VEHICLE LINE
* FROM MEXW0032 (CATALOG CODE), PRODUCT TYPE AND WERS BODY USE
* TO MAKE UP WERS BODY STYLE.
* IF NOT FOUND ON MEXW004 OR MEXW031/MEXW032 DB2 TABLES, WE ARE
* ASSUMING THE ORDER IS FROM HISTORY FOR 'NA' AND 'EA', USE
* MEXW034 DB2 TABLE PRODUCT TYPE CODE AND BODY TYPE FROM MEXW033
* USE TO MAKE UP THE BODY STYLE.

2160P-OBTAIN-WERS-DATA.
SET MEXW034-NOT-FOUND             TO TRUE
IF VEH-DTA-DATA-SRC-C              = LIT-EA OR LIT-NA
IF VEH-GEVIS-VL-C               > "  "
PERFORM 2162P-SELECT-W034-DATA
END-IF
IF MEXW034-FOUND
MOVE VLN-WERS-VL-C          TO WS-DTL-WERS-VEH-LINE-C
MOVE VLN-WERS-BRAND-C (2:1) TO WS-DTL-WERS-BRAND-C
END-IF
ELSE
IF WERS-STRING-FOUND-SW
PERFORM 2165P-WERS-STRING-PROCESS
ELSE
PERFORM 2170P-SELECT-MEXW032-WERS-VL
IF MEXW032-FOUND
PERFORM 2172P-CATALOG-CODE-PROCESS
END-IF
END-IF
END-IF
MOVE SPACES                       TO WS-DTL-WERS-BODY-STYLE-C
IF WERS-STRING-FOUND-SW
STRING VWR-WERS-PRD-TP-C
VWR-WERS-STRING-X-TEXT(10:2)
DELIMITED BY SIZE INTO
WS-DTL-WERS-BODY-STYLE-C
END-STRING
ELSE
PERFORM 2190P-EVAL-CATLG-BDYTYPE
END-IF
.
* RETRIEVES THE WERS VEHICLE LINE DATA USING THE GEVIS VEHICLEE
* LINE CODE AND PRODUCTION SOURCE.
* NOTE: THIS ONLY APPLIES TO 'NA' AND 'EA' DATA SOURCES.

2162P-SELECT-W034-DATA.
MOVE VEH-DTA-DATA-SRC-C           TO VLN-DTA-DATA-SRC-C
MOVE VEH-GEVIS-VL-C               TO VLN-GEVIS-VL-C
MOVE LIT-Y                        TO VLN-ACTIVE-F
PERFORM 7060P-SELECT-MEXW034
.
* PROCESS FEATURE DATA FROM WERS STRING W004 TABLE
* EVALUATE WERS VEHICLE LINE.  THESE ARE HANDLED AS
* EXEPTIONS AS THEY CAN APPEAR MUTIPLE TIMES FOR
* DIFFERENT GEVIS VEHICLE LINES.

2165P-WERS-STRING-PROCESS.
MOVE VWR-WERS-VL-C               TO WS-WERS-VL-C
IF  WS-VALID-VEH-LINE-CDS
EVALUATE VWR-WERS-VL-C
WHEN "KI"
WHEN "K5"
MOVE "L5"           TO VLN-GEVIS-VL-C
MOVE "AB"           TO VLN-WERS-BRAND-C
SET MEXW034-FOUND   TO TRUE
WHEN "DB"
MOVE "DB"           TO VLN-GEVIS-VL-C
MOVE "AB"           TO VLN-WERS-BRAND-C
SET MEXW034-FOUND   TO TRUE
END-EVALUATE
ELSE
PERFORM 2162P-SELECT-W034-DATA
END-IF
IF  MEXW034-FOUND
MOVE VLN-GEVIS-VL-C          TO WS-DTL-GEVIS-VEH-LINE-C
MOVE VWR-WERS-VL-C           TO WS-DTL-WERS-VEH-LINE-C
MOVE VLN-WERS-BRAND-C (2:1)  TO WS-DTL-WERS-BRAND-C
ELSE
MOVE VEH-GEVIS-VL-C          TO WS-DTL-GEVIS-VEH-LINE-C
MOVE VWR-WERS-VL-C           TO WS-DTL-WERS-VEH-LINE-C
MOVE SPACES                  TO WS-DTL-WERS-BRAND-C
END-IF
.
* SELECT THE VEHICLE LINE FROM THE MEXW032_CATALOG TABLE.

2170P-SELECT-MEXW032-WERS-VL.
MOVE VEH-DTA-DATA-SRC-C           TO CTG-DTA-DATA-SRC-C
MOVE VEH-CATALOG-C                TO CTG-LCL-CATALOG-C
PERFORM 7070P-SELECT-VL-MEXW032
.
* EVALUATE CATALOG CODE VEHICLE LINE.  THESE ARE HANDLED AS
* EXEPTIONS AS THEY CAN APPEAR MUTIPLE TIMES FOR
* DIFFERENT GEVIS VEHICLE LINES.

2172P-CATALOG-CODE-PROCESS.
MOVE CTG-VHL-VEH-LINE-C           TO WS-WERS-VL-C
IF  WS-VALID-VEH-LINE-CDS
EVALUATE CTG-VHL-VEH-LINE-C
WHEN "KI"
WHEN "K5"
MOVE "L5"            TO VLN-GEVIS-VL-C
MOVE "AB"            TO VLN-WERS-BRAND-C
SET MEXW034-FOUND    TO TRUE
WHEN "DB"
MOVE "DB"            TO VLN-GEVIS-VL-C
MOVE "AB"            TO VLN-WERS-BRAND-C
SET MEXW034-FOUND    TO TRUE
END-EVALUATE
ELSE
PERFORM 2180P-SELECT-MEXW034-GEVIS-VL
END-IF
IF MEXW034-FOUND
MOVE VLN-GEVIS-VL-C            TO WS-DTL-GEVIS-VEH-LINE-C
MOVE CTG-VHL-VEH-LINE-C        TO WS-DTL-WERS-VEH-LINE-C
MOVE VLN-WERS-BRAND-C (2:1)    TO WS-DTL-WERS-BRAND-C
END-IF
.
* RETRIEVES THE GEVIS VEHICLE LINE DATA USING THE DATA SOURCE AND
* WERS VEHICLE LINE CODE.

2180P-SELECT-MEXW034-GEVIS-VL.
MOVE VEH-DTA-DATA-SRC-C           TO VLN-DTA-DATA-SRC-C
MOVE CTG-VHL-VEH-LINE-C           TO VLN-WERS-VL-C
MOVE LIT-Y                        TO VLN-ACTIVE-F
MOVE CTG-VPT-PROD-TYP-C           TO VLN-WERS-PRD-TP-C
PERFORM 7080P-SELECT-VL-MEXW034
.
* BY USING THE DATA OBTAINED FROM TABLE MEXW001 IN THE WHERE
* CLAUSE, THE WERS BODY TYPE WILL NOW BE OBTAINED TO CREATE THE
* BODYSTYLE.

2190P-EVAL-CATLG-BDYTYPE.
IF MEXW031-FOUND
STRING CTM-VPT-PROD-TYP-C
CTM-OPT-OPTION-C
DELIMITED BY SIZE INTO
WS-DTL-WERS-BODY-STYLE-C
END-STRING
ELSE
IF VEH-DTA-DATA-SRC-C           =  LIT-EA  OR  LIT-NA
PERFORM 2192P-SELECT-MEXW033-DATA
IF  MEXW033-FOUND
AND BDT-WERS-BDY-TYP-C       >  SPACES
STRING VLN-WERS-PRD-TP-C
BDT-WERS-BDY-TYP-C
DELIMITED BY SIZE INTO
WS-DTL-WERS-BODY-STYLE-C
END-STRING
END-IF

2198P-GET-MEXW003-STATUSES.

* PROCESS WHOLESALE INFORMATION

3010P-PROCESS-WHOLESALE.
MOVE VEH-ORD-ID-C                 TO VST-VEH-ORD-ID-C

PERFORM 8300P-OPEN-40V-CSR

IF MEXW003-40V-CSR-ROW-FOUND

WS-DTL-LAST-QAD-VST-GBL-LOC-C

VINCENT-OUT

* OBTAINS THE CURRENT DEARBORN TIMESTAMP, PART OF WHICH WILL BE

* ALONG WITH THE VINCENT HEADER.

7000P-OBTAIN-DRBN-TIMESTAMP.

SET  :WS-CURR-DRBN-TIMESTAMP    = CURRENT TIMESTAMP
END-EXEC
MOVE SQLCODE                      TO SC-DB2-SQLCODE
EVALUATE TRUE
WHEN SC-DB2-SQLCODE-OK

MOVE "DB2-TIMESTAMP"     TO DB2-ABEND-TABLE
MOVE DB2-ABEND-MSG       TO ABEND-MSG
MOVE "7000P"             TO ABEND-PARAGRAPH
PERFORM 9999I-ABEND
END-EVALUATE

* UPDATE THE TIMESTAMP ON THE MEXS016 TABLE WITH THE TIME THAT
* THE JOB STARTED.  THIS VALUE WILL BE READ IN THE NEXT TIME THIS
* PROGRAM IS EXECUTED.

SET    GNT_ATTRIBUTE_DATA     = :GNT-ATTRIBUTE-DATA
WHERE  GNT_SYSTEM_CD          = :GNT-SYSTEM-CD
AND    GNT_TABLE_ID           = :GNT-TABLE-ID
AND    GNT_KEY_DATA           = :GNT-KEY-DATA

EVALUATE TRUE

CONTINUE

INTO AUDIT-RECORD

DELIMITED BY SIZE
INTO AUDIT-RECORD

DELIMITED BY SIZE
INTO AUDIT-RECORD

DELIMITED BY SIZE
INTO AUDIT-RECORD
END-STRING
WRITE AUDIT-RECORD
MOVE SPACES              TO AUDIT-RECORD
WRITE AUDIT-RECORD
MOVE SQLCODE             TO DB2-ABEND-SQLCODE
MOVE "UPDATE"            TO DB2-ABEND-FUNCTION

MOVE DB2-ABEND-MSG       TO ABEND-MSG

.
* A CALL WILL BE PLACED TO TABLE MEXW035 IN EITHER OF TWO SIT-
* UATIONS.  1) TO OBTAIN THE SUPER DEALER CODE WHICH WILL BE
* USED IN PLACE OF THE GLOBAL ORDERING DEALER CODE AND/OR GLOBAL
* CURRENT STOCKING DEALER CODE.  2)  TO DETERMINE WHETHER OR NOT
* THE CURRENT STOCKING DEALER IS WDMO BASED.

7020P-GET-MEXW035-DATA.

,DLR_SUPER_DLR_C
INTO :DLR-SUB-SUBLVL1-C
,:DLR-SUPER-DLR-C

DELIMITED BY SIZE
INTO AUDIT-RECORD

* SELECTS SALES DATA FROM MEXW008_VEH_RTL

7040P-SELECT-MEXW008-90V-DATA.
EXEC SQL
SELECT  A.VST_STAT_Y
,B.VRS_LCL_FLEET_C
,B.VRS_CST_FIRST_N
,B.VRS_CST_BUS_1_N
,B.VRS_CST_BUS_2_N
,B.VRS_CST_MID_INIT_X
,B.VRS_CST_LAST_N
,B.VRS_CST_ADDR_1_X
,B.VRS_CST_ADD_DIV2_N
,B.VRS_CST_ADD_DIV1_C
,B.VRS_CST_POSTAL_C
,B.VRS_SALESPERSON_C
,B.VRS_TYP_LCL_CUST_C
,B.VRS_RPT_SALE_Y
,B.VRS_WARR_STRT_Y
INTO  :VST-STAT-Y
,:VRS-LCL-FLEET-C
,:VRS-CST-FIRST-N
,:VRS-CST-BUS-1-N
,:VRS-CST-BUS-2-N
,:VRS-CST-MID-INIT-X
,:VRS-CST-LAST-N
,:VRS-CST-ADDR-1-X
,:VRS-CST-ADD-DIV2-N
,:VRS-CST-ADD-DIV1-C
,:VRS-CST-POSTAL-C
,:VRS-SALESPERSON-C
,:VRS-TYP-LCL-CUST-C
,:VRS-RPT-SALE-Y
,:VRS-WARR-STRT-Y
FROM  MEXW003_VEH_STATUS A
,MEXW008_VEH_RTL B
WHERE  A.VEH_ORD_ID_C        = :VST-VEH-ORD-ID-C
AND  A.DTA_DATA_SRC_C      = :VST-DTA-DATA-SRC-C
AND  A.STA_STATUS_C        = :VST-STA-STATUS-C
AND  A.VST_LAST_OCCUR_F    = :VST-LAST-OCCUR-F
AND  A.VST_ACTIVE_F        = :VST-ACTIVE-F
AND  A.VST_ACTIVE_F        = B.VRS_ACTIVE_F
AND  A.STA_STATUS_C        = B.STA_STATUS_C
AND  A.VEH_ORD_ID_C        = B.VEH_ORD_ID_C
AND  A.DTA_DATA_SRC_C      = B.DTA_DATA_SRC_C
AND  SUBSTR(A.VST_LCL_LOC_C, 1,7)
= B.VRS_LCL_DLR_C
AND  A.VST_STAT_Y          = B.VRS_RETAIL_Y
END-EXEC

TO TRUE
WHEN OTHER

DELIMITED BY SIZE
INTO AUDIT-RECORD
END-STRING
WRITE AUDIT-RECORD
MOVE SPACES              TO AUDIT-RECORD

DELIMITED BY SIZE
INTO AUDIT-RECORD
END-STRING
WRITE AUDIT-RECORD
MOVE SPACES              TO AUDIT-RECORD

DELIMITED BY SIZE
INTO AUDIT-RECORD
END-STRING
WRITE AUDIT-RECORD
MOVE SPACES              TO AUDIT-RECORD
MOVE SQLCODE             TO DB2-ABEND-SQLCODE
MOVE "SELECT"            TO DB2-ABEND-FUNCTION
MOVE "SELECT-MEXW008-90V-DATA"
TO DB2-ABEND-TABLE

* SELECT WHOLESALE INFORMATION

7050P-SELECT-WHOLESALE.

SELECT A.VST_GBL_LOC_C
,A.VST_STAT_Y
,B.VWS_TOT_LCL_A
,B.CUR_CURRENCY_C

AND  A.DTA_DATA_SRC_C        = :VST-DTA-DATA-SRC-C

* WRITE ABEND MESSAGES TO AUDIT FILE, ROLLBACK TO PREVIOUS       *
* CHECKPOINT, CALL COREDUMP.                                     *

9999I-ABEND.
IF ABEND-PROGRAM                   = SPACES
MOVE PL-PGM-NAME              TO ABEND-PROGRAM
END-IF
MOVE SPACES                       TO AUDIT-RECORD
WRITE AUDIT-RECORD
MOVE ABEND-MSG                    TO AUDIT-RECORD
WRITE AUDIT-RECORD
MOVE ABEND-MSG-2                  TO AUDIT-RECORD
WRITE AUDIT-RECORD
MOVE SPACES                       TO AUDIT-RECORD
WRITE AUDIT-RECORD
CALL "COREDUMP"
